Description: Are you a creative genius with a passion for visual storytelling? Do you have a knack for bringing ideas to life through captivating animations and motion graphics? If so, we want you to join our team as a Motion Graphic Designer!About Us:INK Communications is a dynamic and innovative Advertising company, known for pushing the boundaries of creativity. We pride ourselves on delivering cutting-edge design solutions that leave a lasting impact on our clients and their audiences.Position Overview:As a Motion Graphic Designer at INK Communications, you will be at the forefront of our creative team, responsible for producing stunning motion graphics and animations that convey complex messages with style and flair. You'll collaborate closely with our talented team to create visually compelling content for a diverse range of projects.Key Responsibilities:Develop visually striking motion graphics, animations, and visual effects for various multimedia projects, including videos, presentations, and advertisements.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to conceptualize and storyboard ideas, ensuring alignment with project objectives and client requirements.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to continuously enhance the quality and impact of our motion graphics.Edit and enhance existing video content to maintain consistency and visual excellence.Participate in brainstorming sessions, offering creative insights and ideas to elevate projects.Manage project timelines and deliver high-quality work within deadlines.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Animation, or related field (or equivalent work experience).Proven experience as a Motion Graphic Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your creative work.Proficiency in industry-standard software such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Cinema 4D or Maya and Adobe Creative Suite.Solid understanding of animation principles, visual storytelling, and graphic design concepts.Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment, communicate ideas effectively, and adapt to feedback.Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.What We Offer:To apply, please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you're the perfect fit for our team.Email to: Communication@inkadvertising.netJob Details
